body.value:
Labdoo ID #___________________________
1. Make sure all parts are properly tagged with the same Labdoo ID number (laptop, adaptor and other external components)
2. Notes on any defects or limitations (eg. no wifi, missing keys ...)
___________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________
3. Make sure Edubuntu is properly installed. (Test it with the GCompris game)
4. Open the Internet Browser and go to www.labdoo.org (Test the Internet connection)
5. Play a video from Youtube to make sure video and sound play properly.
6. Offline Wikipedia/ebook installation (Wikidoo) /or xowa offline wiki for different languages (should show its icon on the desktop)
7. Installation of English Training Material (EnglishBanana)
8. Language:______________________________________
